episodios.nome: Right, From That Time On, The Switch is Turned On Already
Do You Believe In Encounters Scheduled Long Before?
Hand to Hand, Shoulder to Shoulder, Back to Back, And Then. It is Fine Even With Clothing.
There are Times When We Feel We Understand Each Other Beyond Our Imaginations. The Opposite Happens Frequently Too.
The Obstacles are Not Always the Ones Close to Us. But the Less We Know the Person, The More Difficult It Is.
A Good Way to Forget Your Own Problems. How About Sticking Your Head into Other People's Troubles?
An Image Must Always Be Built Upon. Because It is Something That Falls Apart From the Beginning.
The Less Time We Have, the More We Accomplish, the More We End Up Doing. Love is the Same.
There's No Need for Clever Scenarios in Memories. The Second They Come Out, Everyone Speaks Nonsense of Them.
The reason a one person fight feels hollow isn`t just because it's one person. The eyes of the audience hurt.
Time Does Not Solve the Thorns In Our Heart. It Just Puts A Label of Oblivion On It.
To bind. To deceive. To take away. To give. What's most painful is to wait.
The vase was leaning toward one side, yet you didn`t notice? Because there was not even a drop of water left.

metadata_completo.sinopse:
Can a relationship between a regular college student and an idol singer survive? That is the question that White Album tries to answer. Touya Fujii is a normal college student with normal worries—namely balancing his classes and his job he works to pay for school. He is also concerned about the amount of time he has to spend with Yuki Morikawa, or rather, the lack of it.

Being an up and coming idol singer, Yuki has concerns of her own. Even though she's not yet as popular as experienced veteran Rina Ogata, Yuki is turning heads and landing interviews on television. This should be a good thing, but not everyone is happy about the attention she receives from the media and from Rina. The idol industry is surprisingly cutthroat, and rival singers have their eyes on Yuki.

While it may seem exciting to watch your girlfriend on television, how does Touya really feel about all this? Between the challenges associated with Yuki's career and other people that Touya meets at his university, their relationship may not last…
